item.title: Dark Bow
item.dc:creator: @gr1ndlewald gr1ndlewald
item.description:
@gr1ndlewald wrote:

hi i have problems with the dark bow training strengh instead of range

ive added this to my client.java

if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 15156) {
PkingDelay = 5;
wepdelay = 5;
UseBow = true;
}

so now it should train range but it doesn’t

someone told me i have to edit the special too but im not sure whatpart of it i have to edit… any help please?

Read full topic
